features: 【100% Two-Year Warranty】This Clothes Steamer support 2-years free exchange service. If you have any problem with the product, you can contact us and we will provide you with a solution within 24 hours.

【Improved Nozzle & 8FT Long Power Cord】- Get the newest portable steamer for clothes design includes a new nozzle design & 8FT long power cord that distributes steam powerfully and consistently to enjoy wrinkle-free. This clothes steamer is Safe to use on all types of clothes including household fabric like furniture upholstery, bedding, drapery, and tablecloth.

【Fast-Heating Water Tank】- Easy-fill water tank using one on/off switch, takes only 40 seconds heat-up handheld steamer and lasts up to 8 minutes of continuous steaming to emit wrinkle-busting perfectly.

【Lightwelght & Compact】-Compact design travels and stores easily .Its compact size and weight (1 pounds) with a high capacity of 130Ml made this clothes steamer perfect for travel, easily fit in a suitcase.
【Safe to Use】 - Automatic shut-off safety protection when a unit gets too hot or too low in the water. "USER MANUAL" included - please read it carefully for safety and perfect use.

Notes: Only fill the tank with cold water, do not use hot water. Distilled water is recommended.(not exceed the maximum level line)If you encounter product failure or water spray, please immediately contact our after-sales customer service team for commodity replacement service. Tip for use: After use, remember to unplug the power and pour out the remaining water in the sink.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Becoolpet Steamer for Clothes Wrinkle Removes Do you have problems with clothes wrinkles in your daily life Now we strongly recommend this handheld steamer. It can also use to remove wrinkles in clothes, cushions, beds and other fabrics around the house. Item Weight: 1 pounds. Water Tank Capacity: 130 milliliters. Steam ready time: 40 seconds Steam Duration: 8 minutes. Voltage: 110V - 120V Wattage: 700W - 800W

Usage Tips! Notes: 1. Never turn the unit upside down. Your Travel Garment Steamer should never be tilted past a 45-degree angle especially when the unit is ON. Never use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourself. 2. The mist is super hot, please keep away from the hot steam. 3. Only fill the tank with cold water, do not use hot water. Distilled water is recommended. 4. Please use a transformer that can convert the voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.

Easy Operation: 1. Rotate the nozzle head, and open the steamer. And then fill the tank with cold water to the desired level(not exceed the maximum level line). When you finish filling, lock the head back on. 2. Turn the ON/OFF switch to the ON position. The switch light indicates the steamer is on. The steamer will emit steam from nozzle in 2 minutes. 3. After about 8 minutes of continuous steaming, or the steamer runs out of the water, it will reset automatically to ensure your safety while leaving the indicator light ON. 4. When you are finished with your steaming session place the ON/OFF switch in the OFF position and remove the plug from the outlet.
Lightwelght and Compact.1lbs Lightly,40s Fast Heat-up, 8 Minutes of Continuous Steam,8FT Long Power Cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Like a Charm
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been telling myself for years that I need a handheld steamer/iron; but there always seemed to be something I felt I needed more, at the time. This past week, I bought a new shower curtain for my guest bath. I’ve had the old shower curtain for almost 5 years, and it still shows all the creases it had straight out of the package, even after repeated washings. This time, I knew I had to pull the trigger and get a handheld steamer. This steamer does everything it’s supposed to do. It is small, but mighty, with a long cord - I appreciate that it’s not a rechargeable device, as so many things seem to be. And it’s easy to use. Unlock the top, to remove it, revealing the water cup. Fill it with water to the Max line, replace the top, locking it on. Turn the device on with a flip of the power switch, and wait about 2 minutes. This one seemed to be boiling at just over the 1 minute mark. When the water boiled, it did start to spit and splutter a bit, but after a few seconds it settled down, and steam began to come out of the nozzle. I simply picked it up, and began moving it up and down on my hanging shower curtain, concentrating on the fold lines. It took me a few minutes to figure out a good rhythm, and how close to the fabric I could hold the steamer (hold it directly on the fabric, if it’s something like a shower curtain). I got interrupted about halfway through, so just turned the steamer off and set it on my bathroom counter. When I got back to it, it was cool enough that I could remove the top and check the water. It was almost empty, so I filled it again, and began steaming as soon as it was warmed up. I completed the whole shower curtain, and I’m so pleased with it’s seamless appearance. Sadly, I forgot to get before pictures, but you can see how nicely it falls, without fold lines, in the attached photo. It’s beautiful! This is the year I’m finally going to hang semi-sheer curtains on two large windows. I’m not even dreading it, because I know I can steam them when they’re hung, rather than trying to iron them, which never works well. I know I’ll be using this little steamer enough to regret that I didn’t get it years ago. At $22.99, as of this writing, I feel this is a good value, especially considering how much time and effort it’s going to save me. Small but mighty handheld steamer - I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: I got this steamer to remove a few wrinkles from a couple different sets of curtains that I already have hanging. The thinner the fabric, of course the easier the wrinkles fall out when steaming. It does a good job as long as you hold it right up really close to the fabric of whatever you are steaming. It took out every wrinkle and one of the curtains was more of a drape like thicker material. It will run for about ten minutes. It starts steaming within the first two minutes and then steams for 8 minutes. I put only reverse osmosis water in it. I think this steamer is a good value. It doesn't weight much and is easy to use. It also has a very long electric cord. It is kind of hard to see the max water line unless you are in a very well lit area. You don't want to overfill it. I really do like it and I will be getting a lot of use out of it. I recommend this economical steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT Portable Steamer
reviews.reviewText: It's super lightweight, heats very quickly, and it just needs some water to do the job. It's very easy to use, just flip the switch with water in it, and poof. The head is shaped the correct way to spread the steam in a nice thin line. It does a great job of steaming and clears wrinkles quickly.We're using these on the road and on future trips. Having a business trip with formal clothes, well de-wrinkling them makes them look just oh so much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars compact, convenient, effective!
reviews.reviewText: Don’t let the size fool you. This little steamer tree hats no taller than a water bottle does such a good job getting the wrinkles out. So easy to use. Just pour the water in, turn button on and the water starts boiling at about 30 seconds. Steams comes out at about 45 seconds, ready for use.The compact size makes this very portable to carry anywhere you need a quick wrinkle fix. Worked great on our curtains as well as clothes.The extra long (8ft) cord allows for a lot of movement.Just a word of caution:the steam is VERY hot, as the warning shows, so watch your hands and young children nearby.Also make sure to use distilled water for longevity of the steamerMost tap water contain too much mineralsWould highly recommend this Becoolpet steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile Steamer - Lightweight - Heats Quickly - Wrinkles Removed
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this steamer! Lightweight, super simple to use, quick and efficient. I love the versatility this small size provides. I can put it in my suitcase when I travel, add it to my overnight bag, and use it in the mornings to remove wrinkles on my work clothes. I like that the lock/unlock safety feature for the top portion is easily visible. The steam nozzle is not too big and makes it easy to cover a good amount of fabric. The opening to add water is good sized, and I really like that I can clearly see how much water is in it. Once you turn it on the water heats quickly and you can see it boiling. In no time the steam is already coming out! I was able to iron 3 costume dresses on one tank of water. The one in the video is polyester, I also tried it on broad cloth material which took a few more passes but easily removed all the wrinkles. We are only allowed to load one video, so wasn't able to show the different material types. I found it to be packaged well, instructions easy to follow, and appreciated the safety information. This is definitely a winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Would be perfect if it got wrinkles out
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The description is accurate in every way except the part about it ironing your clothes. I tried this on 3 different fabrics, cotton, polyester, & linen. The wrinkles didn’t come out of any of them. It does heat very quickly, as advertised though. It was definitely under 1 minute from power to full steam. I’ll give them that. It’s also a conveniently small size, making it great for travel. If you want it for something other than removing wrinkles from your clothes, you may love it. I don’t find any other purpose for it, though. It just doesn’t fulfill its purpose.
